mapper.sql: id, datasource_id, name, folder, parent_package, module, datasource_name, database_name, table_name, have_deleted, description, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by
mapper.select: select * from main.template where name = #{name} and have_deleted = 0
select * from main.template where have_deleted = 0 order by id desc limit #{count}
select * from main.template where have_deleted = 0 order by id desc

select
distinct
from template
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into template (id, datasource_id, name, folder, parent_package, module, datasource_name, database_name, table_name, have_deleted, description, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{haveDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

datasource_id = #{row.datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{row.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
folder = #{row.folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

module = #{row.module,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update template set id = #{row.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, datasource_id = #{row.datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{row.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folder = #{row.folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_package = #{row.parentPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module = #{row.module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datasource_name = #{row.datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, database_name = #{row.databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_name = #{row.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, have_deleted = #{row.haveDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{row.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{row.createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{row.updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{row.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{row.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

datasource_id = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update template set datasource_id = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folder = #{folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_package = #{parentPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datasource_name = #{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, database_name = #{databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, have_deleted = #{haveDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `template` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL, `datasource_id` bigint NOT NULL, `name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `folder` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `parent_package` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `datasource_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `database_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `table_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `have_deleted` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0, `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `updated_at` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `updated_by` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
